New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 6 月 2 日星期日 00:58:47 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Former Auckland teacher Murray Sakey sentenced over child sex images he claims provided inspiration for writing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-auckland-teacher-murray-sakey-sentenced-over-child-sex-images-he-claims-provided-inspiration-for-writing/XRQIY5ARGJDTFIDVPVPMRTWFDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-auckland-teacher-murray-sakey-sentenced-over-child-sex-images-he-claims-provided-inspiration-for-writing/XRQIY5ARGJDTFIDVPVPMRTWFDU/ Katie HarrisPolice found hundreds of objectionable photos and videos on his devices. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:30:03 +0000 Auckland man Murray Sakey, 74, pleaded guilty to having hundreds of child exploitation images. Sakey was sentenced on May 24, 2024, in the Waitakere District Court. Photo / Katie Harris
Man dies after his vehicle rolls on a bend in Northland and crashes into trees https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/man-dies-after-his-vehicle-rolls-on-a-bend-in-northland-and-crashes-into-trees/EWWVY2LUHZC3NIJJTOY5XH4BC4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/man-dies-after-his-vehicle-rolls-on-a-bend-in-northland-and-crashes-into-trees/EWWVY2LUHZC3NIJJTOY5XH4BC4/ Avneesh VincentThe car rolled on a gentle bend and hit trees. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:29:58 +0000 Police confirmed that the deceased driver was a male from Northland.
Study reveals how New Zealand’s biggest quake-maker stokes world-famous volcanic zone https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/study-reveals-how-new-zeallands-biggest-quake-maker-stokes-world-known-volcanic-zone/GDYY46HOXZGERKWACFE5CDPO7A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/study-reveals-how-new-zeallands-biggest-quake-maker-stokes-world-known-volcanic-zone/GDYY46HOXZGERKWACFE5CDPO7A/ Jamie MortonWhat puts the fire in the belly of a local volcanic zone that's produced monster blows. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:05:15 +0000 The Hikurangi Subduction Zone marks the margin where the the Pacific Plate dives – or subducts – westward beneath the North Island. Image / GeoNet
Taupō KiwiSport programme makes sure kids find a sport they love https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-kiwisport-programme-makes-sure-kids-find-a-sport-they-love/EEEHDTCFTVD3TAHI3SL3ZQOK3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-kiwisport-programme-makes-sure-kids-find-a-sport-they-love/EEEHDTCFTVD3TAHI3SL3ZQOK3Y/ Milly FullickA Taupō organisation is working tirelessly to help kids find a sport they love. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Taupō Kiwisport helps kids get involved in events like the Taupo Rippa Rugby Carnival.
The World: Floating apartment building of millionaires coming to Napier for two nights https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/the-world-floating-apartment-building-of-millionaires-coming-to-napier-for-two-nights/NEDTIYNMS5BJDJB22QK7CDQEWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/the-world-floating-apartment-building-of-millionaires-coming-to-napier-for-two-nights/NEDTIYNMS5BJDJB22QK7CDQEWU/ Doug LaingYacht, launch, floating apartment building? This year it'll be in port for two nights. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Inside cruise liner the World, which has 165 privately owned apartments and which visits Napier in October during a 2024 world tour of more than 90 ports. Photo / Supplied.
‘Tower of Otara’ sparks safety concerns, neighbour scared of going into own backyard https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tower-of-otara-sparks-safety-concerns-neighbour-scared-of-going-into-own-backyard/JZMV7OSM7JDF7EEBAWQYJPFIQQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tower-of-otara-sparks-safety-concerns-neighbour-scared-of-going-into-own-backyard/JZMV7OSM7JDF7EEBAWQYJPFIQQ/ Lincoln TanThe ramshackle tower has become 'like a tourist attraction'. Auckland caregiver Kilikilitefua’i’afitu Fualalo twisted religion to prey on vulnerable child https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-caregiver-kilikilitefuaiafitu-fualalo-twisted-religion-to-prey-on-vulnerable-child/ARJ5HEU4HJBARPHD7FFWECLJFA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-caregiver-kilikilitefuaiafitu-fualalo-twisted-religion-to-prey-on-vulnerable-child/ARJ5HEU4HJBARPHD7FFWECLJFA/ Craig KapitanHe was charged in 2022 with exploiting his positon of trust over 15 years earlier. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Auckland resident Kilikilitefua'i'afitu Fualalo has been sentenced to prison for sexually abusing a vulnerable at-risk teen who was in his care in the mid-2000s.
Prime Minister Christopher Luxon speaks ahead of trip to Niue and Fiji this week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-heads-to-niue-and-fiji-this-week/EGPDSQ5KTBHCBAZALQX4OUTU7A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-heads-to-niue-and-fiji-this-week/EGPDSQ5KTBHCBAZALQX4OUTU7A/ The trip will be Luxon’s first visit to the region as Prime Minister. King’s Birthday weekend crash: One person seriously injured in Christchurch crash, detour on SH1 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kings-birthday-weekend-crash-one-person-seriously-injured-in-christchurch-crash-detour-on-sh1/FF35OCWRSJD7RGL3AWE6366RMQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kings-birthday-weekend-crash-one-person-seriously-injured-in-christchurch-crash-detour-on-sh1/FF35OCWRSJD7RGL3AWE6366RMQ/The road is currently blocked northbound.
